document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Asia Minor , Levant, Siberia ( Caldara 2013a ).

Biology. Meadows in forests, wet grasslands, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in IV–VIII. On Scrophulariaceae :
Scrophularia nodosa
,
S. umbrosa
( Wingelmüller 1937 ; Hoffmann 1958 );
Verbascum nigrum
,
V. phlomoides
( Wingelmüller 1937 ; Smreczyński 1976 );
Limosella aquatica
(it is probably misidentified
Scrophularia umbrosa
) ( Smreczyński 1976 );
V. phoeniceum
,
V. thapsus (Gumovsky 1997)
;
V. lychnitis (Isayev 2007)
.
